00171 
00184 #if (DOX!=0) || (NOSCFG_FEATURE_MEMALLOC != 0)
00185 
00199 void* nosMemAlloc(UINT_t size);
00200 
00209 void  nosMemFree(void *p);
00210 
00211 /* overwrite standard memory allocation functions */
00212 #ifndef NANOINTERNAL
00213 #ifdef malloc
00214 #undef malloc
00215 #endif
00216 #ifdef calloc
00217 #undef calloc
00218 #endif
00219 #ifdef free
00220 #undef free
00221 #endif
00222 #define malloc  nosMemAlloc
00223 #define calloc  (not_supported)
00224 #define free    nosMemFree
00225 #else /* NANOINTERNAL */
00226 /* internal malloc/free, used by OS core and platform ports */
00227 #if NOSCFG_MEM_MANAGER_TYPE == 0
00228 #define NOS_MEM_ALLOC(x)   malloc((size_t)(x))
00229 #define NOS_MEM_FREE(x)    free(x)
00230 #elif   NOSCFG_MEM_MANAGER_TYPE == 1
00231 void*   nos_malloc(unsigned int size);
00232 void    nos_free(void *mp);
00233 #define NOS_MEM_ALLOC(x)   nos_malloc(x)
00234 #define NOS_MEM_FREE(x)    nos_free(x)
00235 #elif   NOSCFG_MEM_MANAGER_TYPE == 2
00236 #define NOS_MEM_ALLOC(x)   NOSCFG_MEM_USER_MALLOC(x)
00237 #define NOS_MEM_FREE(x)    NOSCFG_MEM_USER_FREE(x)
00238 #endif
00239 #endif /* NANOINTERNAL */
00240 
00241 #endif /* NOSCFG_FEATURE_MEMALLOC */
00242 
00243 #if (DOX!=0) || (NOSCFG_FEATURE_MEMSET != 0)
00244 
00256 void nosMemSet(void *buf, char val, UINT_t count);
00257 
00258 #ifdef memset
00259 #undef memset
00260 #endif
00261 #define memset  nosMemSet
00262 
00263 #endif /* NOSCFG_FEATURE_MEMSET */

00443 #if (DOX!=0) || ((NOSCFG_FEATURE_CONOUT != 0)&&(NOSCFG_FEATURE_PRINTF != 0))
00444 
00445 void n_printFormattedN(const char *fmt, NOSARG_t args);
00446 
00447 #if (DOX!=0)
00448 
00463 void nosPrintf1(const char *fmt, arg a1);
00464 
00465 #else /* DOX!=0 */
00466 #define nosPrintf1(fmt, a1)  \
00467   do { \
00468     NOSARG_t args[1]; args[0] = (NOSARG_t)(a1); \
00469     n_printFormattedN(fmt, args); \
00470   } while(0);
00471 
00472 #define nosPrintf2(fmt, a1, a2)  \
00473   do { \
00474     NOSARG_t args[2]; args[0] = (NOSARG_t)(a1); \
00475     args[1] = (NOSARG_t)(a2); \
00476     n_printFormattedN(fmt, args); \
00477   } while(0);
00478 
00479 #define nosPrintf3(fmt, a1, a2, a3)  \
00480   do { \
00481     NOSARG_t args[3]; args[0] = (NOSARG_t)(a1); \
00482     args[1] = (NOSARG_t)(a2); args[2] = (NOSARG_t)(a3); \
00483     n_printFormattedN(fmt, args); \
00484   } while(0);
00485 
00486 #define nosPrintf4(fmt, a1, a2, a3, a4)  \
00487   do { \
00488     NOSARG_t args[4]; \
00489     args[0] = (NOSARG_t)(a1); args[1] = (NOSARG_t)(a2); \
00490     args[2] = (NOSARG_t)(a3); args[3] = (NOSARG_t)(a4); \
00491     n_printFormattedN(fmt, args); \
00492   } while(0);
00493 
00494 #define nosPrintf5(fmt, a1, a2, a3, a4, a5)  \
00495   do { \
00496     NOSARG_t args[5]; args[0] = (NOSARG_t)(a1); \
00497     args[1] = (NOSARG_t)(a2); args[2] = (NOSARG_t)(a3); \
00498     args[3] = (NOSARG_t)(a4); args[4] = (NOSARG_t)(a5); \
00499     n_printFormattedN(fmt, args); \
00500   } while(0);
00501 
00502 #define nosPrintf6(fmt, a1, a2, a3, a4, a5, a6)  \
00503   do { \
00504     NOSARG_t args[6]; \
00505     args[0] = (NOSARG_t)(a1); args[1] = (NOSARG_t)(a2); \
00506     args[2] = (NOSARG_t)(a3); args[3] = (NOSARG_t)(a4); \
00507     args[4] = (NOSARG_t)(a5); args[5] = (NOSARG_t)(a6); \
00508     n_printFormattedN(fmt, args); \
00509   } while(0);
00510 
00511 #endif /* DOX!=0 */
00512 #endif /* NOSCFG_FEATURE_PRINTF */

00542   } while(0);

00549   } while(0);

00556   } while(0);

00559   do { \

00561     args[0] = (NOSARG_t)(a1); args[1] = (NOSARG_t)(a2); \
00562     args[2] = (NOSARG_t)(a3); args[3] = (NOSARG_t)(a4); \
00563     n_sprintFormattedN(buf, fmt, args); \
00564   } while(0);

00579     args[4] = (NOSARG_t)(a5); args[5] = (NOSARG_t)(a6); \
